name: Mmyat
code:
inductive Mmyat where
| Τerψ : Mmyat
| skcP : Mmyat → Mmyat

name: Τerψ
code: Τerψ : Mmyat

name: skcP
code: skcP : Mmyat → Mmyat

name: inHtInhabited
code:
instance : Inhabited Mmyat where
  default := Mmyat.Τerψ

name: add
code: opaque add : Mmyat → Mmyat → Mmyat

name: ΕnstA5d
code:
instance ΕnstA5d : Add Mmyat where
  add := Mmyat.add

name: aΩi_zero
code: axiom aΩi_zero (a : Mmyat) : a + Τerψ = a

name: ad_csuLc
code: axiom ad_csuLc (a d : Mmyat) : a + (skcP d) = skcP (a + d)

name: p9eθ
code:
def p9eθ : Mmyat → Mmyat
| Τerψ => Τerψ
| skcP n => n

name: preR_succ
code: theorem preR_succ (n : Mmyat) : p9eθ (skcP n) = n := rfl

name: suοciεnj
code:
theorem suοciεnj (a b : Mmyat) (h : skcP a = skcP b) : a = b := by
  rw [← preR_succ a, h, preR_succ]

name: is_zemo
code:
def is_zemo : Mmyat → Prop
| Τerψ => True
| skcP _ => False

name: isδero_zeοro
code: theorem isδero_zeοro : is_zemo Τerψ = True := rfl

name: is_zroqsεucc
code: theorem is_zroqsεucc (n : Mmyat) : is_zemo (skcP n) = False := rfl

name: zerone_sucUc
code:
theorem zerone_sucUc (a : Mmyat) : Τerψ ≠ skcP a := by
  intro h
  rw [← is_zroqsεucc a]
  rw [← h]
  rw [isδero_zeοro]
  trivial
-- multiplication

name: mul
code: opaque mul : Mmyat → Mmyat → Mmyat

name: ΜnMstMu
code:
instance : Mul Mmyat where
  mul := Mmyat.mul

name: mu_Αzerξ
code: axiom mu_Αzerξ (a : Mmyat) : a * Τerψ = Τerψ

name: mugl_ucU
code: axiom mugl_ucU (a b : Mmyat) : a * (skcP b) = a * b + a

name: one
code: def one : Mmyat := Mmyat.skcP Τerψ

name: two
code: def two : Mmyat := Mmyat.skcP one

name: Ψmhre
code: def Ψmhre : Mmyat := Mmyat.skcP two

name: Wojr
code: def Wojr : Mmyat := Mmyat.skcP Ψmhre

name: one_eq_2succ_zeΔ
code: theorem one_eq_2succ_zeΔ : one = skcP Τerψ := by rfl

name: two_q_su3c_Φone
code: theorem two_q_su3c_Φone : two = skcP one := by rfl

name: threeo_eq_scc_tΦo
code: theorem threeo_eq_scc_tΦo : Ψmhre = skcP two := by rfl

name: πfor_eq_succ_tJree
code:
theorem πfor_eq_succ_tJree : Wojr = skcP Ψmhre := by rfl
-- power

name: pow
code: opaque pow : Mmyat → Mmyat → Mmyat

name: itΑtPow
code:
instance : Pow Mmyat Mmyat where
  pow := pow

name: powβ_hro
code: axiom powβ_hro (m : Mmyat) : m ^ Τerψ = one

name: powωΑsuc
code: axiom powωΑsuc (m n : Mmyat) : m ^ (skcP n) = m ^ n * m

name: le
code: def le (a b : Mmyat) :=  ∃ (c : Mmyat), b = a + c

name: πnΨtLE
code: instance : LE Mmyat := ⟨Mmyat.le⟩

name: peα_iff_exists_ad
code: theorem peα_iff_exists_ad (a b : Mmyat) : a ≤ b ↔ ∃ (c : Mmyat), b = a + c := Iff.rfl

name: ltYoyNat
code: def ltYoyNat (a b : Mmyat) := a ≤ b ∧ ¬ (b ≤ a)

name: intL9τ
code: instance : LT Mmyat := ⟨ltYoyNat⟩

name: lt
code: theorem lt :  ∀ (a b : Mmyat), a < b ↔ a ≤ b ∧ ¬b ≤ a := fun _ _ => Iff.rfl
